import React from "react" import ProductImage from "../ProductImage/ProductImage" import ProductQuantityForm from "./ProductQuantityForm" import tbproduct1 from "../../asset/image-product-1-thumbnail.jpg" import tbproduct2 from "../../asset/image-product-2-thumbnail.jpg" import tbproduct3 from "../../asset/image-product-3-thumbnail.jpg" import tbproduct4 from "../../asset/image-product-4-thumbnail.jpg" import mobile_product from '../../asset/image-product-1.jpg' function ProductDetail(props) { return (

{props.company}

{props.name}

{props.description}

${props.price}

{props.discount}%

${props.mrp}

 ) } export default ProductDetail
